name: Result
desc: A sealed class to represent the result of an operation.

name: asyncFlatMap
desc: async flat map result

name: Result.error
desc: A failed result with a BaseError.

name: errorOrNull
desc: Returns the error if this is a Result.error or null otherwise.

name: flatMap
desc: flat map result

name: fold
desc: Returns the result of applying one of the functions to this result.

name: from
desc:
Constructs a Result from a function. If the function completes successfully,
the Result is a success with the value of the function. If the function fails,
the Result is an error with the error of the function.

name: fromAsync
desc:
Constructs a Result from a Future. If the Future completes successfully,
the Result is a success with the value of the Future. If the Future fails,
the Result is an error with the error of the Future.

name: fromPredicate
desc:
Constructs a Result by testing a condition. If the condition is true,
the Result is a success with a certain value. If the condition is false,
the Result is an error with a certain error.

name: getOrNull
desc: Returns the value if this is a Result.success or null otherwise.

name: isError
desc: Returns true if this is a Result.error.

name: isSuccess
desc: Returns true if this is a Result.success.

name: map
desc: map result

name: Result.success
desc: A successful result with a value of type T.
